      • decodificaBR

        public java.lang.String decodificaBR(int reglas,
                                     int atributos,
                                     java.lang.String[] nombreAtributos,
                                     java.lang.String[] nombreClases)
        It decodifies the Rule Base stored in the chromosome into an string for its visualization
        Parameters:
        reglas - int Total number of rules
        atributos - int Total number of attributes
        nombreAtributos - String[] Attribute Names
        nombreClases - String[] Class names
        Returns:
        String An string containing the best rules found during the search process
